Plot: A kidnapped mother and son escape from a room in which they have endured imprisonment for the entirety of the boy's life. Upon breaking free from its confines, they experience a dramatic homecoming, provoking insight into the depths of imagination and the extent of a mother's love.
Title: Room
Writer: Emma Donoghue (screenplay), Emma Donoghue (based on the novel by)
Actors: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Sean Bridgers, Wendy Crewson
tomatoConsensus: Led by incredible work from Brie Larson and Jacob Tremblay, Room makes for an unforgettably harrowing -- and undeniably rewarding -- experience.
